com.compendium.core.db
Class DBViewProperty

java.lang.Object
  com.compendium.core.db.DBViewProperty

public class DBViewProperty
extends java.lang.Object

The DBViewProperty class serves as the interface layer between the View Properties and the ViewProperty table in the database.

Author:
Michelle Bachler

                             java.lang.String sUserID,

Inserts a new ViewProperty in the database and if successful.

Parameters:
DBConnection - dbcon com.compendium.core.db.management.DBConnection, the DBConnection object to access the database with.
String - sUserID, the current user's id.
UIViewFrame - viewFrame, the frame whose properties to insert into a new ViewProperty record.
Returns:
boolean, true if it was successful, else false.

java.sql.SQLException
